scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npm run minify && node server.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development budo index.js --live --pushstate --host=localhost --port=8888 --base=/ --onupdate "standard | notify-error" -- -t sheetify/transform -t babelify
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify index.js -t [ sheetify/transform ] -p [ css-extract -o ./build/assets/bundle.css ] -t [ babelify ] -t [ envify ] -t [ yo-yoify ] -t [ unassertify ] --full-paths -o ./build/assets/bundle.js
scripts.unit: cross-env NODE_ENV=test tape -r babel-register -r babel-polyfill **/*.unit.js | tap-spec
scripts.unit/watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=test tape-watch -r babel-register -r babel-polyfill **/*.unit.js | tap-spec
